website_summaries.verdict: Though they may not be up to major competition, these skates are practical for most wearers despite some comfort concerns, and have a lot to offer considering the reasonable price.
pros: Straightforward design that's ideal for pond skating, ice hockey practice, and minor play
Blades are fairly sharp upon delivery
Men's sizes – but with a little effort women can find a pair to fit
cons: Material is stiff until they are broken in
Some wearers gripe that the ankle padding isn't thick enough

customer_reviews.title: Now they fit perfect and seem very sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Skates are quite stiff and break-in would have taken awhile I think. I ended up baking mine and then wearing them around the house with skate guards on for a few hours one afternoon, and that did the trick. Google "baking hockey skates" for how to do this. Now they fit perfect and seem very sturdy and well-made, especially for the price. A quick $15 initial sharpening at our rink, and good to go! Unless you play or skate multiple times per week, these are probably perfect for you...I'm a casual once-a-week skater with my son, and couldn't justify hundreds on pro-level skates, these are awesome for me.
customer_reviews.author: Philly McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Sizes way to small
customer_reviews.text: Guided by the reviews and by universal guidelines online, size 7 should have been the perfect fit but the skates were way too small. Checked the measurements again after receiving the boots and again size 7 should have been perfect with a little room to spare. The product doesn't come with size guidelines online, what's making shoe size decision at this point impossible. $12.00 spent on returning the skates and left with no product. Very disappointing. Moving to a different brand. The skate box says US 7, EUR 39/40. I am a EUR size 39 and the skates were not just tight but I would say they were 2 o 3 sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garriga

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual skates
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates for the $. I don't play hockey currently, but these work really well for my weekend skating. Nice support and seem well made. I am usually about a 10.5 sneaker and ordered a 9, which is about normal for a good fit with hockey skates. Might be ok for laid back rec league, but anything more serious I'd go up step or two to a CCM or Bauer vapor. Definitely can't complain for the money.
customer_reviews.author: H/D Mile Eater

customer_reviews.title: To be continued..
customer_reviews.text: Nice and well built definitely not a Bauer but not bad for the price. Now let’s see how long they last. Will report back..
customer_reviews.author: Italybos

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a Hockey player and I just started skating.
customer_reviews.text: The skates came with an aggressive grind on the blade. I fought with it, because I didn't know how different grinds affected skating. I tided the skates on as tight as I could to get more control. When it came time for sharpening the guy made the hollow on the bottom of the blades flatter. Now I don't have to tie my skates supper tight and I'm enjoying the skates even more.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skate!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in an 11 for my 14 year old who wears a 10.5. They fit great, with room for heavy socks!! He can't praise these enough. He feels they are comfortable and his ankles feel supported.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: They hurt my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I skate once a month and had these for 2 years. They are really stiff and hurt my angle and my feet. The pain gets bad after 20-25 minutes and I cannot skate anymore. I once got some rentals and they were absolutely great. I will try to buy a more comfortable pair, and maybe sell these for $5 or so when I have a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Popoveniuc

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure what it is about these skated, ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about these skated, but my feet really hurt after about 5 minutes. I've tried tightening them and loosening them. I've been skating with them at least 10 times now with my girls and still not used to them. I don't have a comparison but I can't imagine it is just me.
customer_reviews.author: TechDad

customer_reviews.title: Listen, these are amazing. Period.
customer_reviews.text: This skates are literally the best for their price. Don’t believe the bs fake comments. These hockey skates are so comfortable and very nice on the ice. I bought these skates and within 3 weeks of skating lessons I learned how to do a lot of hockey skating techniques. I use these often and they’re my favorite. However these skates are used for speed and have a little less bite on the ice but I love that factor. Also it is best to get them sharpened to your preference. But overall, best investment ever.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad skates
customer_reviews.text: My husband couldn't even skate in these for 10 minutes with our son. He tried again but after 20 minutes he was in pain. These skates are the worst!
customer_reviews.author: j'lene

customer_reviews.title: Quality fine but looks leave a little to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be fine, but very bulky, like a rollerblading boot ball the slim streamlined ice skates. And though I thought they looked great, when she wears them with more advanced skaters she looks babyish with the bulk and not tan heel like everyone else has. Wouldn’t recommend based on asthmatics only.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to lace them as directed (over, under, over, etc.) to keep the laces tight while putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: dj-1984

customer_reviews.title: Great to start with
customer_reviews.text: They are great for starter skates. Really great deal. Good fit. Good comfort. The guy at the hockey shop even complemented me on the choice in brand
customer_reviews.author: Basi

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: Description said that it should fit like your normal shoe sizing but this wasn't the case as they were quite a bit smaller than expected. I returned these and ordered a size up and there was no difference. Returned those, too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Larson

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a US 12 and we ordered the size 13 and they were still too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for price
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap skates I bought this with my money and I am ten and I am a size 8 1/2 I like to skate a lot and it is great for its price I HIGHLY RECAMEND
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Wild small
customer_reviews.text: I got a half a size bigger than foot size and still too small. So make sure to get a wild larger size than you are. Good value however.
customer_reviews.author: Alec H. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skate FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is not a pair of CCM Super Tacks, its a cheap Chinese hockey skate, perfect to let your kid try the sport or skate a few times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff, some guy from NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew told me it is his favorite gift from last Christmas. You can't beat that price either. I know cause I tried most other options.
customer_reviews.author: Austin T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck for the occasional user.
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck for the occasional user. Very pleased, though I just skate on the pond with my little kids. I can't say how they would hold up to more aggressive use.
customer_reviews.author: MarineEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and are very comfortable. They arrived in a timely fashion. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Fit is pretty good I wear a 14 ordered 13s and play ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit is pretty good I wear a 14 ordered 13s and play old man league hockey. They seem to be holding up well and I like them very much for the price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mr deeds

customer_reviews.title: Plastic boot
customer_reviews.text: These plastics boots are unforgiving and cold. Definitely do not wear on the pond.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McBride

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very hard on the inside with a small plastic bump right where your big toe should go. Not very comfortable. I even ordered a size bigger and didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than the size labeled
customer_reviews.text: The size chart says size 12 30.3 cm. The exterior of the skate barely measures 29 cm. It's definitely 2 sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: Yules

customer_reviews.title: The skate skates
customer_reviews.text: The best and only skate I have ever owned. 😂 But they seem like they are great quality. It is nice not having to use rented ones.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, I use them quite often, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erik johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be broken in. Something a 13 year old doesn't have patience for. But I think they look great, definitely need sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice and price
customer_reviews.text: I am a recreational skater. I have used them 4 times so far. Feel sturdy, ride well. No issues. Couldn't have asked for better skates.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Stefanov

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skate last month. My first time using them today then I found out one of the skate is uneven from the other one. I'm really disappointed with this purchase cause I can't return them anymore due to one month return policy.
customer_reviews.author: danan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ice Skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance for Christmas and he loves them!! He's used them multiple times now and they work great. They are not professional by any means, but they are great, affordable ice skates for anyone who likes to skate now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than the 20 year old skates they replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a little off season so I haven't had a chance to actually skate on them yet. So this review is just based on 30 plus years' of experience with Bauer hockey skates. First of all the fit is great. Yes, they are stiff and so were my last 2 pair of Bauer's, but the width and length feel the same. Ankle support (very important with skates!) is excellent. Next, the materials feel very durable. For the money, it's worth taking a chance, and first impressions of these are excellent. IMHO. Looking forward to getting them out on the pond in the late Fall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeppo!

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Sizes were wrong, they killed my feet, very uncomfortable. Spend the extra money and get better quality skates, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: These take a long time to break in. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These take a long time to break in. I finally found the right socks. I might just have bone-y ankles but these are stiff
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Dimitriev

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old just started skating. He loves these skates! Great bang for you buck.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McGrail

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable boot, good blades
customer_reviews.text: These Skates are not overly comfortable and the sides dug into my ankle and caused a blister the first time i wore them. They were the cheapest skates that i could find, and were not worn in when i wore them. The blades came pretty sharp and to me fairly decent quality. The boot is the only part of the skate that i have an issue with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: My grandson liked them, I was more impressed with the American cougar ones. But.. he is going to wear them. I found them to be a bit stiff, he will only use sporadically so... I guess we will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I’m an amateur user but I find this piece to be well constructed not too heavy either. Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: MotelDéPott

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got skates 2 sizes smaller than shoe size and they are perfect. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: danamj

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs about 1 size too small! The next size up is double the price! (Strange).
customer_reviews.author: SavvyDeals

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Skates seam like they will be nice. It will take time to break them in. Good price for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: I wanted them to take my son ice skating over holiday break but they were wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Box says size 8 and the skates are size 6
customer_reviews.author: Maggie E. Koterba

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I imagined but not bad. No complains on anything else. Good pair of skates for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Adriel Valladares

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought ice skate for the first time. It look good and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Early fall

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: The delivery can me very quick. Very impressed on that. A quality of true product is good. However, better to get the one with the strap lock rather than this design.
customer_reviews.author: Saranya Khanal

customer_reviews.title: Great value, work fine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Work great and about 10 wearings in no issues at all. Not the most comfortable skates in the world, but pretty normal for hockey skates.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H. Kain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit to size indicated
customer_reviews.text: For my 11 year old son. Perfect fit to size indicated. Great deal for the money - casual skater does not play hockey. Will buy again next year when his foot out grows.
customer_reviews.author: Manners Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the quality. But you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the quality. But you pay for what you get! After an hour of skating, the blades seemed off balance.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Tabi

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: These skates work great! I found that it had to lace them up and leave them laced up for a couple days so that they would fit right and lace tight but that is no downside.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Slack

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for xmas - they were a great deal and came on time. The skates are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These skates were great. I would suggest getting some foam to put at the toes but other then that the skates are a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mathias Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Size may be different
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11. Ordered a 12. It was too small and had no room for my big toe. Re ordered a 13 and it seems good so far.
customer_reviews.author: David g

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I already used it once. The size is true to shoe size. I bought a size 9 and they fit perfectly. I got the skates sharpened at the local ice rink for 6 dollars. Sharpening would be the only other thing you need to consider. The package also came as promised. I would definitely buy again here.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my 10 Year old who has never really ice skated but we moved to a home that has a lake that freezes up- so we wanted ice skates. I didn't want to spend a lot of money since I wasn't sure if he was going to enjoy skating but, the skates work great. They are very stiff which made them hard to get use to. But now he wears 2 pairs of socks to get them from rubbing his ankle. We haven't skated in them much but so far they are good for what we are using them for.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Roses

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely zero padding in the front. Just plastic. Also size ran a little small.
customer_reviews.author: jessica andrews

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: These were a b-day gift for my husband and I didn't want to spend a lot of money since this was a new sport for him and I didn't know how much he'd really get into it. The skates appeared to be decent quality, but after skating in them for 10 minutes, he complained about something jabbing into his ankle - in both skates but in different spots. We exchanged them for another pair, and the problem recurred (in new spots). Ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my grandsons. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Ineson

customer_reviews.title: Rental is better
customer_reviews.text: The skate is painful to wear. I spent more time putting them on than having them on me. There is no cushion whatsoever around the ankle area. All I felt from my ankle is a big metal piece squeezing my ankle to the point that I cannot walk. I even wore extra thick socks and they didn't help. I took them out and took out a rental instead. although the rental is bad condition, it is still much more comfortable than this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Basic skate OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skate just for ice skating with my daughters. For that it is adequate. I wouldn't recommend it for outdoor use, but just for rinks. If liked the price and that has me out on the ice with my girls. But... I wish I had paid for the more expensive Rollerblade style boots of higher ranked skates. But not a bad purchase. I'll keep using. Neil
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Size was off for me.  Ordered the next size up.  I take a 10.5 shoe and ordered size 10 in skate.
customer_reviews.text: For someone that may ice skate once every two years, I wanted something cheap. This is no $250.00 skate. I have not tried it yet and I am sure there will be comfort issues. But that is ok for the small amount of time I am actually on the ice. The skate is dull, thus you will need to sharpen it. As for size, I take a 10.5 shoe. Thus, in skate size, that is a size 9. My first pair, they were very small. I returned by Amazon and ordered a size 10. It fits great now. I am pleased
customer_reviews.author: bahhhoo

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable skates I've worn
customer_reviews.text: Skates came sharp, but maybe too sharp. I can't hockey stop with these and neither can my friend who plays hockey. The upside is it makes it easy to not fall cause you really dig into the ice. But these skates are not comfortable. After the first use I had blisters on both feet. I've used them maybe two times after and still they hurt. They get the job done, but wear thick socks or you're in for some pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with order
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with order. I am a 9 1/2 -10 in women's shoes and ordered an 8 in men's. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jes13s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my 8 year old and are lots of fun:)
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Solid skate, maybe too solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skate for a beginner/intermediate level. After many uses and trying to break it in, it is still very firm and plastic feeling. I've used heat on it while not in use to try to get a little bit of elasticity around the laces and tongue, but it's stayed really solid. That can either be a really good thing if you like it, or a less than great thing if you're like me. Either way, I like the skates and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Turcovski

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Well made but a little smaller than I expected. Anyone buying these should get one size bigger than you think.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good skates but not good enough ankle support
customer_reviews.text: My son thought they were ok but he didn't like the support they gave around the ankles. It could be just him
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Padula

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Skates
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best ice skates I ever purchase. I had a previous pair which were stolen. I re-purchased because of the excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: good skates for the momey
customer_reviews.text: Great skates, in great condition. We are a casual skating family, so I can't speak to the quality in regards to serious hockey playing, nut they work for us!
customer_reviews.author: Tara McKeever

customer_reviews.title: One word: Painful
customer_reviews.text: These are the most painful skates I've ever worn. Do you have normal size ankles? Yeah, these aren't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tedd Post

customer_reviews.title: Good Skates, good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good skates for the money. I'm the occasional skater and by no means a pro. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: The skates shipped quickly and they were a perfect fit! If you're looking for a skate to causally go skating, this is the skate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: tjohns1984

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable but you get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: N. R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandson
customer_reviews.text: Good skates for the price! They work well. My grandson really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ... the skates - said they fit well and look cool.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the skates - said they fit well and look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Oleksy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the opening to our new boardwalk ice rink!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Demma

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert skater but these are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brice E

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED these skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates are comfy and fast. Just AMAZING. There's nothing much else to say except that these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KayleeD

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Amaing skates and very comfortable as well. I go skating once or twice a week and i feel good witht hem so far
customer_reviews.author: anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Padden

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these and while I was fully aware sometimes you get what you pay for, I wasn't expecting this. Outside is well made but the inside not so much. Only skate a couple times a month so I didn't need anything crazy, after 10 minutes I had cuts on my ankles. Inside liner needs work. I got these sharpened so now I'm stuck with these. They are in their box holding up a shelf in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: fit really good
customer_reviews.text: By the time i got them the ice when out so i could not try them out,
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Labrie

customer_reviews.title: hockey skates
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY FROM THEM, THEY LIE. These were way to big and i have tried getting permission to send back and so far no one will email what to do. they say to email for authorization for return and no one will response. i will not buy from this vendor again. I called they said they could not email a return immediately that it takes 10 days. well i waited twice and not received a return authorization, even though when i call they say they will send one. I NEVER RECEIVED. IF YOU THINK YOU MIGHT NEED TO RETURN, DO NOT BUY FROM THEM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. It is very cheap looking and also cheaply made too. I've never had anything that UNCOMFORTABLE every on my feet. The "leather" is very bad, way too hard. I wasn't able to tight it properly despite how hard i pull to get it tighter. After half an hour of trying, the shoes still didn't fit the way it should for an ice skate. It's also ugly. I could come up with a 500 word review for this one but i guess i could sum it up in 3 words: DON'T BUY IT. Some people said it was ok probably it's cheap..
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: American Ice Force 2.0 Hockey Skate
product_meta.description:
Engineered to provide explosive power and agility, the American Ice Force 2.0 hockey skate is the lightest its ever been.

Enhanced Comfort and Fit

We have developed a cutting edge customized PVC injection mold that gives the American Ice Force 2.0 hockey skate extra lateral support around the ankle and a custom feel right out of the box.

Breathable inner liner softly packed with padding for customized feel

Nylon blade holder and toe box for durability

Durable Construction

Stainless steel blade optimizing speed and agility

Copper rivets to maximize heel support

 * Perfect skates for beginner skaters to intermediate skaters
 * Indoor and Outdoor skates, good for pond hockey
 * Light weight sidewall injection mold giving the skate a custom fit right out of the box
 * Stainless steel blade
 * Sizing is true to shoe size
feature_bullets: Perfect skates for beginner skaters to intermediate skaters
Indoor and Outdoor skates, good for pond hockey
Light weight sidewall injection mold giving the skate a custom fit right out of the box
Sizing is true to shoe size
